content.description: This is a library bot made for Vampire Survivors

fields.name: How To Use
fields.value:
Use `!itemname` To search for that item.
The default prefix is ! but it can be changed by an admin.
To get information about a category, use `!categoryname`

fields.name: Found an issue?
fields.value: We all make mistakes! Open an issue on the [GitHub](https://github.com/SHA65536/Vampire-Survivors-Bot) to let us know!

content.title: Vampire Survivors
